episodes.title: This is how to join Jehovah's Witnesses (and why you shouldn't) | "enjoy life forever" book review
episodes.description:
Jehovahs Witnesses bring new members into their religion by reading their book titled "enjoy life forever". Let's talk about the entire process of joining the religion from beginning to end, including the organized to do jehvoahs will book. We'll also talk about predatory methods of bringing people into the religion.

Become a youtube member: https://owenmorgan.com/telltale-membership
